title: Liz Truss – 2022 Comments on Inability to Deliver Trade Deal with the US
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Liz Truss, the Prime Minister, on 20 September 2022. The comments were made before boarding a plane to the United States.
content:
There aren’t currently any [trade] negotiations taking place with the US and I don’t have an expectation that those are going to start in the short to medium term.
